document_data.name: Eyes of the Darkbringer
document_data.mainbody: The '''Eyes of the Darkbringer''', who referred to themselves as the '''Darkeyes''', was an organization of [[rogue]]s who worshiped [[Moander]], the Rotting God.
document_data.Base of Operations: Agents of the Eyes of the Darkbringer were secretly placed within most major cities spread across [[Faerûn]].
document_data.Activites: The Darkeyes carried out assassinations and served as spies for Moander's cult, warning the larger organization of potential threats in advance.
